Rolls.InvalidFocusModifier: The Focus dice modifier (foc, foc<=#) must be applied after a count successes modifier (cs<5) or it will be overwritten!

Heat.Name: Heat
Heat.Hint: Amount of banked Heat available to the GM to spend.

Momentum.Name: Party Momentum
Momentum.Hint: Amount of banked Momentum available to the party to spend.

MaxMomentum.Name: Max Party Momentum
MaxMomentum.Hint: How much Momentum is the party allowed to bank?

ShowHeatToPlayers.Name: Show Heat To Players
ShowHeatToPlayers.Hint: Should the GM's current Heat tracker be showed to players?

Damage.Label: Damage
Damage.Hint: Damage dealt on a failed contagion test.

Chronic.Label: Chronic?
Chronic.Hint: Chronic contagions remain around (and dormant) after being cured, unless the GM spends heat to reactivate them.

Term.Label: Term
Term.Hint: How often a check must be made against the contagion.

AddsQualities.Label: Qualities Added to Weapon
AddsQualities.Hint: When used in a weapon, this ammunition adds these qualities to the weapon's own list of qualities.

Cost.Label: Cost
Cost.Hint: Cost of the item as a dice string.

CostPer3.Label: Cost (Per 3)
CostPer3.Hint: Cost to obtain 3 of the item.

Damage.Label: Damage
Damage.Hint: Damage dealt by the weapon. Use XdN for Combat Dice (for example, 3dN for 3 Combat Dice).

Gear.DragQuality: Drag & Drop a Quality item from the item browser to add it to this item!

Rating.Hint: Bonus Momentum given to disguise-based Stealth tests using the ID. Also used as the difficulty of an Analysis, Thievery, or Hacking test to identify the ID as fake.
Rating.Label: Rating

HackingDevice.DragProgram: Drag & Drop a Program gear item from the item browser to add it to this hacking device as a pre-installed program! These programs will be copied over when the Hacking Device is added to a character or NPC sheet.

PreinstalledPrograms.Label: Preinstalled Programs
PreinstalledPrograms.Hint: These programs (usually UPGRADEs) come pre-installed on this Hacking Device

HackingDevice.ProgramAlreadyAddedNotification: The {name} software is already installed on this Hacking Device!

Maintenance.Label: Maintenance
Maintenance.Hint: Maintenance cost of the item as a dice string.

Gear.QualityAlreadyAddedNotification: This item already has the {name} quality!
Gear.QualitiesOnlyNotification: Only a Quality can be dropped on an Item Sheet!

ReloadCost.Label: Reload Cost
ReloadCost.Hint: Cost of a clip of this ammunition.

Restriction.Label: Restriction
Restriction.Hint: How rare or hard-to-acquire the gear is.

Tariff.Label: Tariff
Tariff.Hint: Each Effect rolled on the cost adds the numerical portion of the Tariff to its cost.

Host.DragAndDrop: Drag Special Ability items onto this sheet to add them as a Special Ability provided by this LHost!
Host.OnlyAbilities: Only Special Ability items may be dropped on a Host item sheet!

LifePointCost.Label: Life Point Cost
LifePointCost.Hint: If taken during Character Creation, this LHost requires spending this many Life Points.

Player.DragTalents: Drop a Talent item on this character sheet to add it as a Talent!
Player.DragFakeIDs: Drag & Drop Fake ID Gear Items onto the character sheet to add them to this list!
Player.DragLifestyles: Drag & Drop Lifestyle Gear Items onto the character sheet to add them to this list!
Player.EquipHackingDevice: Equip a Hacking Device to equip & make use of Programs for Quantronic actions!

Abbreviation.Label: Abbreviation
Abbreviation.Hint: If an Abbreviation is set, the Quality will be displayed in items with its abbreviation (e.g. 'Comms') instead of full name ('Comms Equipment').

Ranked.Label: Ranked?
Ranked.Hint: Does this quality have a Rank (for example, Concealed 3 is ranked but Disposable is not).

Talent.DragTalent: Drag & drop another talent onto this sheet to set a prerequisite for this talent!
Talent.SameTalentNotification: You cannot set a talent as a prerequisite of itself!
Talent.TalentsOnlyNotification: Only another Talent item can be dropped on a Talent's item sheet as a prerequisite!
